mapper.select: SELECT designer.*, level.name LEVEL,GROUP_CONCAT(style.name SEPARATOR '、') style, CONCAT(d2.district_name,d1.district_name) city FROM designer,designerlevel LEVEL,styleindex style, district d1, district d2 WHERE designer.levelValue = level.id AND FIND_IN_SET(style.id,designer.styleValue) AND designer.id = #{id} AND d1.id = designer.location AND d1.pid = d2.id

SELECT designer.*, level.name LEVEL,GROUP_CONCAT(style.name SEPARATOR ',') style, CONCAT(d2.district_name,d1.district_name) city FROM designer,designerlevel level,styleindex style, district d1, district d2 WHERE designer.levelValue = level.id AND FIND_IN_SET(style.id,designer.styleValue) AND d1.id = designer.location AND d1.pid = d2.id GROUP BY designer.id

select designer.*,level.name LEVEL,GROUP_CONCAT(style.name SEPARATOR '、') style, CONCAT(d2.district_name,d1.district_name) city from designer, designerlevel level,styleindex style, district d1, district d2 where 1=1 and (styleValue like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{style},'%')) or #{style}='') and (levelValue=#{level} or #{level}='') and designer.levelValue = level.id and FIND_IN_SET(style.id,designer.styleValue) AND d1.id = designer.location AND d1.pid = d2.id GROUP BY designer.id
SELECT designer.*, CONCAT(d2.district_name,d1.district_name) city FROM designer, district d1, district d2 WHERE 1=1 AND d1.id = designer.location AND d1.pid = d2.id LIMIT #{n}

select designer.*, CONCAT(d2.district_name,d1.district_name) city from designer, district d1, district d2 where (name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')) or #{name}='') AND d1.id = designer.location AND d1.pid = d2.id
SELECT count(*) from house where designerId = #{id}
SELECT SUM(sum1) total FROM( SELECT count(*) as sum1 FROM appointment WHERE designerId = #{id} UNION ALL SELECT count(*) as sum1 FROM book WHERE designerId = #{id}) as total
select designer.*, CONCAT(d2.district_name,d1.district_name) city from designer, district d1, district d2 where userId = #{id} AND d1.id = designer.location AND d1.pid = d2.id
